import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { faNode, faCss3, faGitAlt, faHtml5, faJsSquare, faReact, } from '@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons' import Loader from 'react-loaders' import AnimatedLetters from '../AnimatedLetters' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import './index.scss' const About = () => { const [letterClass, setLetterClass] = useState('text-animate') useEffect(() => { (async () => { return setTimeout(() => { setLetterClass('text-animate-hover') }, 3000) })(); }, []) return ( <>

I'm a very ambitious front-end developer looking for a role in an established IT company with the opportunity to work with the latest technologies on challenging and diverse projects.

I'm quiet confident, naturally curious, and perpetually working on improving my chops one design problem at a time.

Im hungry

) } export default About
